Maddening_Bolt.help: You fire a bolt of pure madness at your target, causing psionic damage and lowering the target's attack speed.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Monstrous_Scream.help: You unleash a fearsome howl which infects the minds of all those who hear it. The affected targets suffer psionic damage and a reduced chance to hit.
Monstrous_Scream.targetHelp: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Monstrous_Wail.help: You unleash a dreadful wail which infects the minds of all those who hear it. The affected targets suffer psionic damage and are knocked off their feet. There is a chance that an affected target will also be stunned briefly.
Monstrous_Wail.shortHelp: PBAoE, High DMG(Psionic), Knockback(Foe), Chance for Stun(Foe)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Debilitating_Venom.help: You fire toxic quills at your target. These cause lethal damage on impact and inject a toxin that causes toxic damage over time while also lowering defenses. The toxins can stiffen muscles, holding the target in place.
Debilitating_Venom.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Lethal), DoT(Toxic), -DEF(Foe, All), Chance for Hold(Foe)
Debilitating_Venom.targetHelp: You are poisoned and suffer toxic damage over time. Your defense against all attack types is also reduced and you may be held.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

Dreadful_Venom.help: You fire toxic quills at your target. These cause lethal damage on impact and inject a toxin that causes toxic damage over time. The toxins can reduce strength, causing each action a target takes to cost more endurance.
Dreadful_Venom.targetHelp: You are poisoned and suffer toxic damage over time. Your actions cost more endurance to execute.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

Exhausting_Venom.help: You envenom your foe with a powerful poison. This poison deals only minor toxic damage, but the nerves of the body suffer failure. The target takes additional psionic damage from this, along with reductions in regeneration, healing effectiveness, resistance and defense.
Exhausting_Venom.shortHelp: Ranged, Minor DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Toxic), -RES(Foe, All), -DEF (Foe, All), -Regen, -Heal
Exhausting_Venom.targetHelp: You are poisoned and suffer toxic damage over time. Your regeneration, healing effectiveness, resistance and defense are also reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Weakening_Venom.help: You envenom your foe with a powerful poison. This poison deals only minor toxic damage, but the muscles of the body are weakened. This causes minor lethal damage, but also reduces the target's chance to hit and damage potential.
Weakening_Venom.shortHelp: Ranged, Minor DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT(Toxic), -DMG(Foe, All), -ToHit(Foe)
Weakening_Venom.targetHelp: You are poisoned and suffer toxic damage over time. Your damage potential and chance to hit are also reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Enervating_Venom.help: You exhale a toxic cloud of venom in a cone in front of you. All targets caught within the cloud suffer toxic damage over time. Additionally, the venom drains endurance, lowers the target's recovery and reduces both attack and movement speeds.
Enervating_Venom.targetHelp: You are losing endurance and recover endurance more slowly. You also suffer reduced movement and attack speeds.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

Terrifying_Visage.help: You unleash a terrifying scream which causes all nearby foes to tremble in fear. The mind of affected targets is so overwhelmed that it causes psionic damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Resistance.help: Lamashtu is a progenitor of all things terrible and poisonous. As such, she is strongly resistant to psionic and toxic damage.
Resistance.targetHelp: Lamashtu is a progenitor of all things terrible and poisonous. As such, she is strongly resistant to psionic and toxic damage.
